reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cashmere dress to be of great quality, soft, and comfortable, with one noting it feels even better than it looks. The dress is warm and customers like its color, with one mentioning it looks classy on a budget. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it runs extremely small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cash-mere
items.body: Pretty expensive but, but my sister asked for it for her birthday. The quality is nice. It is soft. If it were for me, I wouldnâ€™t have kept it, I think itâ€™s as cute as many other cardigans but 1/8 of the price. The color was vibrant. I got size small she is 5 foot 7 inches ans 130lbs. Fits her well. Read more
items.author: c

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: This dress is exactly what I wanted, for style, comfort and warmth. It is very elegant yet casual, and can be dressed either up or down depending on the occasion. Read more
items.author: Alex

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No pockets!
items.body: Very disappointed. It says it has pockets, which is a MUST for me, but when it arrived I discovered it actually had no pockets! Read more
items.author: Robert K. Fessler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars State Cashemere is super!!!
items.body: State Cashemere is super! High quality product, soft and delicate texture in the touch and body. The model was chic on the body giving a contour that's same time serious and sensual. Very happy with the purchase of the product and seller. Read more
items.author: Magellanrose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars buttons fall off
items.body: Great sweater, nice fit. However, there is a quality problem. Within 24 hours of its arrival, 2 buttons fell off. The string that came with the sweater was too short for sewing on one button, not to mention 2. Two days later, 2 more buttons fell off. Read more
items.author: mikecski

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and good quality. Only reason it isnâ€™t a 5 star ...
items.body: Soft and good quality. Only reason it isnâ€™t a 5 star is that the arms are short. Otherwise itâ€™s a nice fit, very warm and still light weight. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: Renee McGee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top quality
items.body: Been looking for a sweater like this forever. The color is so pretty; like a grey/taupe mix. So soft and warm. I want to get the dark grey when it goes down in price. I'll have this for a long time if the moths don't get at it. Top quality gorgeous sweater. Love, love, love it! thanks! Read more
items.author: Peg

items.author: Trudi Freeland

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black, Heather Grey, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
